tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment_manuals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    manual_text TEXT,
    maintenance_records JSON
)

CREATE TABLE EquipmentManuals (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    manual_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_manuals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    manual_link VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    technician_name VARCHAR(255),
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment_manuals(id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (maintenance_id) REFERENCES maintenance_records(id)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_assignments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    assigned_to VARCHAR(255),
    assignment_date DATE,
    returned_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment_manuals(id)
);
